keyMoments.title: Refuses to Leave Without Visiting Upper Yard
keyMoments.description: Despite the danger and being marked as criminals, Luffy stubbornly insists on visiting Upper Yard before leaving Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's characteristic adventurous spirit and refusal to flee from danger or unexplored territory.
keyMoments.quote: I'm not leaving until I see Upper Yard!

keyMoments.title: Decides to Rescue Captured Crew
keyMoments.description: Upon learning his crewmates have been taken to face God's trials, Luffy confidently declares they just need to beat the priests.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's unwavering confidence and loyalty to his crew, immediately committing to their rescue.
keyMoments.quote: All we have to do is beat those priests! Things just got interesting!

keyMoments.title: Attempts to Convince Crew to Flee
keyMoments.description: After being declared criminals, Nami tries to persuade the crew to leave Skypiea immediately, showing her pragmatic and cautious nature.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Nami's role as the voice of reason and caution, often at odds with Luffy's reckless adventuring.
keyMoments.quote: We need to leave this place now before things get worse!

keyMoments.title: Captured by Super Express Speed Shrimp
keyMoments.description: Nami is aboard the Going Merry when the massive crustacean servant of God pulls the ship away toward Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Nami into the very situation she was trying to avoid, setting up her involvement in the divine trials.

keyMoments.title: Captured by Super Express Speed Shrimp
keyMoments.description: Zoro is aboard the Going Merry when it's pulled away by the massive crustacean toward Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Zoro's upcoming confrontations with God's priests in the Skypiea trials.

keyMoments.title: Helps Gather Food Supplies
keyMoments.description: Sanji accompanies Luffy to pack food supplies from Pagaya's house, separating him from the crew members who get captured.
keyMoments.significance: Being separated from the ship saves Sanji from immediate capture but sets up his later journey to Upper Yard.

keyMoments.title: Gathers Ship Repair Materials
keyMoments.description: Usopp requests and collects materials for ship repairs from Pagaya, which separates him from those who get captured.
keyMoments.significance: Usopp's practical thinking saves him from immediate capture while securing supplies for the Going Merry.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Captured by Super Express Speed Shrimp
keyMoments.description: Chopper is aboard the Going Merry when the massive crustacean pulls the ship toward Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Chopper into the divine trials at the Sacrificial Altar.

keyMoments.title: Captured by Super Express Speed Shrimp
keyMoments.description: Robin is aboard the Going Merry when it's pulled away toward Upper Yard and the Sacrificial Altar.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Robin's involvement in the Upper Yard exploration, which will be significant given her interest in history and poneglyphs.

keyMoments.title: Provides Supplies to Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Pagaya generously allows the Straw Hats to take food and ship repair materials from his home despite the risk.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the hospitality and kindness of Skypiea's citizens, even in the face of God's authority.

keyMoments.title: Explains God's Judgment System
keyMoments.description: Pagaya reveals the nature of the divine judgment system to Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp, explaining the trials that await those taken as sacrifices.
keyMoments.significance: Provides critical exposition about Enel's control system and the mechanics of the upcoming trials.
keyMoments.quote: People who become sacrifices receive one of two judgments of heaven - either the sacrifice or the ordeal.

reveals.information: Has detailed knowledge of God's judgment and trial system in Skypiea

keyMoments.title: Approaches Crew Before Capture
keyMoments.description: Conis approaches the crew members on the Going Merry to tell them about a special cloud shortcut.
keyMoments.significance: Her presence at the ship places her as a witness to the crew's capture by the Super Express Speed Shrimp.
